lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : The Tune Park
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Catherine Cheadle
[00:02.490]I see your monsters I see your pain
[00:07.490]Tell me your problems I'll chase them away
[00:13.490]I'll be your lighthouse
[00:15.490]I'll make it okay
[00:18.490]When I see your monsters
[00:21.490]I'll stand there so brave
[00:24.490]And chase them all away
[00:35.490]I'll be your lighthouse
[00:38.490]I'll make it okay
[00:41.490]When I see your monsters
[00:43.490]I'll stand there so brave
[00:46.490]And chase them all away
[01:23.490]In the dark we we
[01:26.490]We stand apart we we
[01:29.490]Never see that the things we need are staring right at us
[01:35.490]You just want to hide hide
[01:37.490]Hide never show your smile smile
[01:40.490]Stand alone when you need someone it's the hardest thing of all
[01:45.490]That you see are the bad bad
[01:49.490]Bad memories take your time and you'll find me
[01:57.490]I see your monsters I see your pain
[02:03.490]Tell me your problems I'll chase them away
[02:09.490]I'll be your lighthouse I'll make it okay
[02:14.490]When I see your monsters I'll stand there so brave
[02:19.490]And chase them all away
tlyric:
[00:02.490]我看到你的怪物，我看到你的痛苦
[00:07.490]告诉我你的问题，我会把它们赶走
[00:13.490]我将是你的灯塔
[00:15.490]我会没事的
[00:18.490]当我看到你的怪物
[00:21.490]我会勇敢地站在那里
[00:24.490]把他们都赶走
[00:35.490]我将是你的灯塔
[00:38.490]我会没事的
[00:41.490]当我看到你的怪物
[00:43.490]我会勇敢地站在那里
[00:46.490]把他们都赶走
[01:23.490]在黑暗中我们我们
[01:26.490]我们彼此分开
[01:29.490]永远不要看到我们需要的东西就在眼前
[01:35.490]你只是想躲起来
[01:37.490]永远不要隐藏你的微笑
[01:40.490]当你需要一个人的时候，最困难的事情莫过于独自一人
[01:45.490]你看到的都是坏的坏的
[01:49.490]不愉快的回忆慢慢来，你会找到我的
[01:57.490]我看到你的怪物，我看到你的痛苦
[02:03.490]告诉我你的问题，我会把它们赶走
[02:09.490]我将是你的灯塔我会让一切都好起来
[02:14.490]当我看到你的怪物，我会勇敢地站在那里
[02:19.490]把他们都赶走
